p: To investigate whether severe diseases caused by the M-30 infection were related to viral propagation in mice, viral loads in the organs and tissues of A129 mice were determined following infection with 10 2 PFU ( Figure 4). Compared with the S-27-infected mice, M-30-infected mice showed significantly higher viral loads in the thymus ( p = 0.0079), lungs ( p = 0.0079), heart ( p = 0.0119), liver ( p = 0.0097), spleen ( p = 0.0159), stomach ( p = 0.0119), small intestine ( p = 0.0079), large intestine ( p = 0.0079), kidneys ( p = 0.0119), muscle ( p = 0.0159), brain 1 ( p = 0.0112), brain 2 ( p = 0.0119) and spinal cord ( p = 0.0097) at 3 days pi ( Figure 4).
